column4: hi.  does anyone have ideas about how to get applets working in firefox?
java applets?
yes.  applets will not load in firefox.
freechess.org's jin, skyviewcafe.com, the official us clock; none work.
open any website with java applets. and select install missing plugins
i have installed and reinstalled ad nauseam.  but no go.  there are all sorts of posts about this on the ubuntu forums.
are you using firefox?
yes
try skyviewcafe.com.  it's an astronomy site.
i have it working
dang.  mine will not load.  what ff are you using?
ding dang.  do you have any ideas?  i'm at a loss.
install missing plugins gives no options ?
i have everything installed.  all applets load under opera, epiphany, konqueror but not ff.
all my java is good.  it's got to be something in the ff config.
1 sec
ok.  thanks.
you tried this ? https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/browse/type:7
ugghh.  how do i copy that?  or make the screen stop moving?
PM
